semantic_issues: The Enrollment class is not associated with the Student and Course classes in a way that indicates it is a many-to-many relationship.
The Enrollment class should have associations to both Student and Course to represent the enrollment relationship explicitly.
recommendations: Add associations from the Enrollment class to both the Student and Course classes to clarify the many-to-many relationship.
Consider adding visibility modifiers (e.g., + for public) to the attributes in the classes for better clarity.
Include the data types for the attributes in the classes to enhance understanding of the model.
